member.name: M:wyDay.Controls.RichTextBoxEx.InsertLink(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Insert a given text at a given position as a link. The link text is followed by a hash (#) and the given hyperlink text, both of them invisible. When clicked on, the whole link text and hyperlink string are given in the LinkClickedEventArgs.
member.param: Invisible hyperlink string to be inserted

member.summary: Get the link style for the current selection
member.returns: 0: link style not set, 1: link style set, -1: mixed

member.summary: Represents the AutomaticUpdater control.

member.summary: Represents an AutomaticUpdater control.

member.summary: Represents an AutomaticUpdater control.

member.name: M:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.InstallNow
member.summary: Proceed with the download and installation of pending updates.

member.name: M:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.Cancel
member.summary: Cancel the checking, downloading, or extracting currently in progress.

member.name: M:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.ForceCheckForUpdate(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Check for updates forcefully.
member.param: Recheck with the servers regardless of cached updates, etc.
member.returns: Returns true if checking has begun, false otherwise.

member.name: M:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.ForceCheckForUpdate
member.summary: Check for updates forcefully.
member.returns: Returns true if checking has begun, false otherwise.

member.name: E:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.BeforeChecking
member.summary: Event is raised before the update checking begins.

member.name: E:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.BeforeDownloading
member.summary: Event is raised before the downloading of the update begins.

member.name: E:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.Cancelled
member.summary: Event is raised when checking or updating is cancelled.

member.name: E:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.CheckingFailed
member.summary: Event is raised when the checking for updates fails.

member.name: E:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.ClosingAborted
member.summary: Event is raised when an update can't be installed and the closing is aborted.

member.name: E:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.DownloadingOrExtractingFailed
member.summary: Event is raised when the update fails to download or extract.

member.name: E:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.ProgressChanged
member.summary: Event is raised when the current update step progress changes.

member.name: E:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.ReadyToBeInstalled
member.summary: Event is raised when the update is ready to be installed.

member.name: E:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.UpdateAvailable
member.summary: Event is raised when a new update is found.

member.name: E:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.UpdateFailed
member.summary: Event is raised when an update fails to install.

member.name: E:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.UpdateSuccessful
member.summary: Event is raised when an update installs successfully.

member.name: E:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.UpToDate
member.summary: Event is raised when the latest version is already installed.

member.name: P:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.Arguments
member.summary: Gets or sets the arguments to pass to your app when it's being restarted after an update.

member.name: P:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.Changes
member.summary: Gets the changes for the new update.

member.name: P:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.ClosingForInstall
member.summary: Gets if this AutomaticUpdater has hidden this form and preparing to install an update.

member.name: P:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.DaysBetweenChecks
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of days to wait before automatically re-checking for updates.

member.name: P:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.GUID
member.summary: Gets the GUID (Globally Unique ID) of the automatic updater. It is recommended you set this value (especially if there is more than one exe for your product).
member.exception: Thrown when trying to set the GUID at runtime.

member.name: P:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.KeepHidden
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the AutomaticUpdater control should stay hidden even when the user should be notified. (Not recommended).

member.name: P:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.LastCheckDate
member.summary: Gets the date the updates were last checked for.

member.summary: Gets and sets the MenuItem that will be used to check for updates.

member.name: P:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.ToolStripItem
member.summary: Gets and sets the ToolStripItem that will be used to check for updates.

member.summary: The translation for the english strings in the AutomaticUpdater control.

member.name: P:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.UpdateStepOn
member.summary: Gets the update step the AutomaticUpdater is currently on.

member.name: P:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.UpdateType
member.summary: Gets or sets how much this AutomaticUpdater control should do without user interaction.

member.name: P:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.Version
member.summary: Gets the version of the new update.

member.name: P:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.WaitBeforeCheckSecs
member.summary: Gets or sets the seconds to wait after the form is loaded before checking for updates.

member.name: P:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.wyUpdateCommandline
member.summary: Gets or sets the arguments to pass to wyUpdate when it is started to check for updates.

member.name: P:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.wyUpdateLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the relative path to the wyUpdate (e.g. wyUpdate.exe or SubDir\\wyUpdate.exe)

member.name: P:wyDay.Controls.AutomaticUpdater.ContainerForm
member.summary: The owner form of the AutomaticUpdater.

member.name: T:wyDay.Controls.UpdateType
member.summary: Specifies the update type that the AutomaticUpdater uses.

member.name: F:wyDay.Controls.UpdateType.Automatic
member.summary: The AutomaticUpdater will check, download, and install the update completely silently.

member.name: F:wyDay.Controls.UpdateType.CheckAndDownload
member.summary: The AutomaticUpdater will check for and download updatest automatically, then notify the user.

member.name: F:wyDay.Controls.UpdateType.OnlyCheck
member.summary: The AutomaticUpdater will only check for updates and notify the user if updates are found.

member.name: F:wyDay.Controls.UpdateType.DoNothing
member.summary: The AutomaticUpdater will do nothing. All checking must be done manually.

member.name: T:wyDay.Controls.UpdateStepOn
member.summary: Represents the update steps that the AutomaticUpdater goes through.

member.name: F:wyDay.Controls.UpdateStepOn.Nothing
member.summary: The AutomaticUpdater isn't doing anything.

member.name: F:wyDay.Controls.UpdateStepOn.Checking
member.summary: The AutomaticUpdater is checking for updates.

member.name: F:wyDay.Controls.UpdateStepOn.UpdateAvailable
member.summary: Updates are available and ready to be downloaded and installed.

member.name: F:wyDay.Controls.UpdateStepOn.DownloadingUpdate
member.summary: The AutomaticUpdater is downloading updates.

member.name: F:wyDay.Controls.UpdateStepOn.UpdateDownloaded
member.summary: Updates are downloaded and ready to be extracted and installed.

member.name: F:wyDay.Controls.UpdateStepOn.ExtractingUpdate
member.summary: The AutomaticUpdater is extracting updates.

member.name: F:wyDay.Controls.UpdateStepOn.UpdateReadyToInstall
member.summary: Updates have downloaded and extracted and are ready to be installed.

member.summary: Reports the progress in the current update step.

member.summary: Represents the method that will handle an event that is cancelable.

member.summary: Represents the method that will handle a failure event.

member.summary: Represents the method that will handle a success event.

member.summary: Event data for a failed step.
